subheader: Interactive animation story based on a movie
introduction: Group assignment: we had to create an interactive animation based on a movie scene in punk style. We recreated a scene from Crazy Stupid Love and it was targeted at young female adults who love Ryan Gosling.
longdescription: I was responsible for creating the story and coding the whole animation in HTML, CSS and JS.

introduction: Group assignment: we created an innovative concept for an app that generates routes off your beaten paths curated to your personal interests.
longdescription: I was responsible for writing the report, developing the business model and communication plan, and prototyping and coding the website.
